message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $140.
I'm interested in the product, but $140 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
I understand that $110 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $130.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can do $120, but that's as low as I can go.
